mapper.select: select m.menu_id, m.menu_title, m.menu_eng_title, m.menu_content, m.menu_ice_hot, m.menu_onesize, m.menu_date, n.nut_saturated, n.nut_sugar, n.nut_sodium, n.nut_protein, n.nut_caffeine, n.nut_calorie, n.nut_high_caffeine, n.nut_size, n.nut_unit from menu m join nutrient n on m.menu_id = n.menu_id where m.menu_id = #{menu_id} and m.menu_del = 'N'

select m.* from menu m
,category c where m.category_id = c.category_id and m.category_id = #{category_id}
where 1=1
and m.menu_del = 'N'
select nut_id, nut_saturated, nut_sugar, nut_sodium, nut_protein, nut_caffeine, nut_calorie, nut_high_caffeine, nut_size, nut_unit from nutrient where menu_id = #{menu_id}
